ru.danilarassokhin.progressive.util

Interface ComponentCreator


  • public interface ComponentCreator
    Creates components from their classes

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <C> C create(Class<C> componentClass, Object... args)
      Creates object from given class and makes autoinjection for fields and methods if they annotated as @Autofill
      static void invoke(Method method, Object from, Object... args)
      Invokes method from given object and given args
      static boolean isModifierSet(int allModifiers, int specificModifier)
      Check if given modifier is included in all modifiers You can check if method or field you got from Reflection have some modifiers like private, public, etc

    • Method Detail

      • create

        static <C> C create(Class<C> componentClass,
                    Object... args)
        Creates object from given class and makes autoinjection for fields and methods if they annotated as @Autofill
        Type Parameters:
        C - Object to instantiate
        Parameters:
        componentClass - Object class to instantiate
        args - Parameters to pass in class constructor
        Returns:
        Instantiated object of null

      • invoke

        static void invoke(Method method,
                   Object from,
                   Object... args)
        Invokes method from given object and given args
        Parameters:
        method - Method to invoke
        from - Object to invoke method from
        args - Parameters to invoke method with

      • isModifierSet

        static boolean isModifierSet(int allModifiers,
                             int specificModifier)
        Check if given modifier is included in all modifiers

        You can check if method or field you got from Reflection have some modifiers like private, public, etc

        Parameters:
        allModifiers - All modifiers field or method has
        specificModifier - Modifier to check
        Returns:
        true if given modifier presented in all modifiers
